title: Blythe's Spirit - Another romantic comedy .... with a kink
description: The sequel to 'Time Was - a romantic comedy ..... with a kink'What happens after Henry?Sophie is back ...... and she is a very different woman from the rather naive young adult that first fell for her boss, Henry Blythe. Now 'happily' married, with a young son and a career that is going from strength to strength, things are most definitely looking good for her. She even has her own handcuffs and other 'toys' and a husband more than willing to indulge her slightly unorthodox preferences. But, as ever, life is never that simple and things never seem to go as planned...........in the sequel to ‘Time Was’, A romantic comedy with a kink...................................... and as for Henry Blythe?
author: Paul     Adams
